verses.roman:
iṅho dāmodara-svarūpa-śuddha-vrajavāsī
aiśvarya nā jāne iṅho śuddha-preme bhāsi'

synonyms: iṅho—here; dāmodara-svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; śuddha-vraja-vāsī—a pure inhabitant of Vṛndāvana; aiśvarya nā jāne—he does not know opulence; iṅho—he; śuddha-preme—in pure devotional service; bhāsi'-floating.
translation: "Svarūpa Dāmodara is a pure devotee of Vṛndāvana. He does not even know what opulence is, for he is simply absorbed in pure devotional service."
